messages.title: Can we trust Labour with the future of our local NHS?
messages.content: Local residents are worried about plans to close an elderly ward at the Royal. I met with senior managers who told me that these plans are in preparation for moving to a new Hospital.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Expressing concerns over Labour's management of the local NHS and closure plans for an elderly ward.

issues.health: Residents contacted about concerns with Liverpool's NHS. Worries about plans to close an elderly ward at the Royal. Campaign success to save Burns Units at Alder Hey from being downgraded.

leaflet.personalStatement: Even though our campaign was a success and these plans have been put on hold, I am very concerned that they will return after the General Election.

politicalExperience.achievements: Led the campaign to save the Burns Units at Alder Hey from being downgraded.

images.caption: It's a two horse race chart showing Lib Dem and Lab percentages with comments 'Only the Lib Dems can beat Labour here.'

leaflet.additionalNotes: P.S Remember elections in Liverpool are between the Lib Dems and Labour. The Conservatives cannot win here.
